title: NVIDIA Making Radical Changes to CUDA After Nearly 20 Years
author: Agam Shah
description: NVIDIA is making some big-time changes to its AI programming framework, CUDA, which came into existence close to 20 years ago.
cntitle: NVIDIA 在近 20 年后对 CUDA 进行重大更改
cndescription: NVIDIA 正在对其 AI 编程框架 CUDA 进行重大更改，该框架诞生于近 20 年前。
